name: Addictive Tripeak
description:
★A beautiful Tripeak game with special cards, exciting Chain system and challenging Memory game!
★New & Noteworthy in Card Category★
★What's hot Card Category★

Best Tri-peaks game with a twist!
No Ad banners, no full screen ads!
------------------------------------------------
NORMAL MODE
Score as much as possible in 10 Levels! Memory game at 4th and 8th level to gain extra special cards!

PRO MODE
Score as much as possible in 30 Levels! Memory game at every 4th level!

THEME
3 themes to choose from! More to come!
Features:
- HD graphic(support ipad!)
- Two addictive games: Tripeak and Memory (pair matching)
- 6 Perks to unlock
- 4 Special Cards to use in game
- Exciting CHAIN system
- 45 levels - level up to unlock perks and improve chain effects
- Earn credits through Trophy reward system!
- Memory (pair matching) game - challenge your luck and memory
- listen to iPod music while in game

How to play
Play Tripeak with four special cards!
- Stop Time
- Undo
- Wild Card
- New Deal
Reach 5, 10, 15, 20 and 25 chains to unleash chain power!

Collect more special cards in Memory game(also known as Pair)!
